title: Junior Accountant Job at TeamAce Limited
content:
TeamAce Limited - Our client, a luxury Beauty Brand, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Accountant
Job Locations: Ikoyi & Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Junior Accountant, you will be responsible for supporting day-to-day financial transactions, maintaining accurate records, assisting in preparing financial reports, and ensuring compliance with accounting standards and salon policies.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Record daily financial transactions, including sales, expenses, and petty cash.
	Reconcile cash, bank statements, and POS reports.
	Prepare and update invoices, receipts, and payment records.
	Monitor inventory and support stock reconciliation in collaboration with the storekeeper or salon manager.
	Maintain accurate and organized financial records.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	Minimum of 1 year of experience in the beauty or retail industry.
	Familiarity with accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage) and MS Excel.


Salary
N250,000 Monthly (Gross).

title: Virtual Accountant Job at Lendha Technology Limited
content:
Lendha Technology Limited is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Virtual Accountant

Job Location: Nigeria

Job Summary


	As a Virtual Accountant, you'll be responsible for managing our financial records, preparing financial statements, and providing financial guidance and support to our team.
	You'll work remotely and collaborate with our team to ensure accurate and timely financial management.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage financial records, including accounts payable and accounts receivable
	Prepare financial statements, including balance sheets and income statements
	Provide financial guidance and support to the team
	Conduct financial analysis and make recommendations for improvement
	Ensure compliance with financial regulations and standards
	Collaborate with the team to ensure accurate and timely financial management


Requirements


	1-3+ years of experience in accounting and financial management
	Strong knowledge of financial regulations and standards
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
	Strong communication and collaboration skills
	Reliable internet connection and suitable computer equipment


Nice to Have:


	Experience with cloud-based accounting software (Xero, QuickBooks, etc.)
	Knowledge of financial planning and budgeting
	Familiarity with financial analysis and reporting


What We Offer


	Competitive hourly rate or salary (N500,000 - N750,000 Monthly)
	Flexible working hours and remote work arrangement
	Opportunity to work with a leading engineering firm
	Collaborative and dynamic team environment (virtual).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: melissaemmanuel34@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Social Media Manager Job at Startup Soar
content:
Startup Soar (Recruitment Services) - Our client is a fast-growing restaurant located in the heart of Wuse 2, Abuja. Known for its creativity, top-tier service, and culinary excellence, the restaurant is building a standout brand both on-site and online.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager
Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	They are looking for a talented and strategicSocial Media Managerto drive engagement, build brand awareness, and connect with a loyal community of food lovers.
	We’re looking for a creative, data-driven, and highly organized Social Media Manager to develop and execute our social media strategy.
	You’ll be responsible for managing content, engaging with followers, analyzing performance, and building a strong online presence that reflects the restaurant’s identity and values.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy
	Create, schedule, and publish high-quality content (posts, reels, stories, etc.)
	Engage actively with followers, respond to comments/messages, and grow community presence
	Monitor and analyze social media metrics to measure performance and optimize content
	Collaborate with kitchen/creative teams for photo and video shoots
	Stay updated with trends and best practices in the food & hospitality industry
	Run paid ad campaigns and influencer collaborations as needed
	Manage the brand’s voice across all platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, etc.)


Requirements


	2-4 years of experience in social media management, preferably in hospitality, F&B, or lifestyle brands
	Strong knowledge of Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and content creation tools
	Excellent copywriting and communication skills
	Ability to shoot and edit engaging content (photo/video)
	Basic graphic design skills (Canva, Photoshop, or similar)
	Creativity, attention to detail, and a passion for storytelling
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks/projects


What We Offer


	Salary: N120,000 Monthly
	Free staff meals
	Fun, collaborative, and creative work environment
	Opportunities for career growth in a rapidly expanding business
	Freedom to innovate and take ownership of your work.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, portfolio (or social media handles), and a short cover letter to: startupsoarhr@gmail.com using "Application for Social Media Manager Position" as the subject of the email.

Note


	Ready to help shape a restaurant brand people love online? We’d love to meet you!
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
